General.Name: Global Bio-chem Technology Group Company Limited
General.Description: Global Bio-chem Technology Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells corn refined products and corn-based biochemical products principally in Mainland China. It operates through four segments: Upstream, Amino Acids, Polyol Chemicals, and Corn Sweeteners. The company offers corn refined products, including corn oil, corn steep liquor, corn starch, waxy corn starch, corn gluten meal, and corn germ cake, as well as feed pellets. It also provides downstream corn based biochemical products, such as amino acids comprising lysine, protein lysine, L-threonine, and L-glutamic acid; corn sweeteners consisting of high fructose corn syrup, maltodextrin, high maltose syrup, maltose syrup, sorbitol, glucose, and crystallized glucose; modified starches; and chemicals, including ethylene glycol, propylene glycol, butylene glycol, and resins. The company?s products are used in a range of applications, including feed production, food and beverage, cosmetics, textiles, pharmaceuticals, and chemicals industries. Global Bio-chem Technology Group Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
